## Utils.getPkgFromPublicPkgName() method

Gets the `package` from the parent `package` and the `public package name`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPkgFromPublicPkgName(parent: PkgNode, ppn: string): PkgNode;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  parent | [PkgNode](./packer.pkgnode.md) | The parent <code>package</code> |
|  ppn | string | The <code>public package name</code> |
